Thanks for using Journey! This update supports iOS 13 long-press gesture for journal preview and dark theme on the splash screen. With the updated splash screen, screen glare will be greatly reduced when launching Journey app. Other bugs fixes include: Drawing canvas clipped when app is resized on iPad OS, Throwback card showing wrong title, Thumbnails in Media tab not showing correctly when app is resized on iPad OS.

Be sure to try out our new Coach programmes (guided journal) including "New year, new you" to kick of year 2020 and "Creativity & Self Expression I" by personal development blogger Danielle Fernandes.

As always, you can expect an original Coach program every week.

Enjoy!

Thanks for using Journey! This update includes:
- Siri Shortcuts: Shortcuts can be added to Siri to perform tasks and actions.
- Search: Search bar has been shifted to Journey tab, Search flow is improved on the iPad.

Be sure to try out our new Coach programme (guided journal) including "Bedtime Journal I" for a good night rest and "Creativity & Self Expression I" by personal development blogger Danielle Fernandes.

As always, you can expect an original Coach program every week.

Enjoy!

As always, you can expect an original Coach program every week.

Enjoy!

Enjoy!
